snippet: The National Institutes of Health’s price tag stamps President Obama’s Brain Initiative as an effort on the scale of the Human Genome Project.
abstract: National Institutes of Health sets an ambitious $4.5 billion price tag on its part of Pres Obama’s Brain Initiative, stamping it as an effort on the scale of the Human Genome Project.
lead_paragraph: The National Institutes of Health’s price tag stamps President Obama’s Brain Initiative as an effort on the scale of the Human Genome Project.

headline.main: N.I.H. Seeks $4.5 Billion to Try to Crack the Code of How Brains Function
headline.print_headline: N.I.H. Seeks $4.5 Billion to Try to Crack the Code of How Brains Function
